name: Easy Draw: Dot to Dot line 2
name_original: Easy Draw: Dot to Dot line 2
description:
Easy Draw: Dot to Dot line 2 is a simple yet addictive puzzle game!Pairs of points of the same color, using straight line segments. After matching all pointes, you can pass the level.
FEATURES
Over free levels
Different board sizes
Colorful Dots and UI
Musical Sound Effects
Turns mode, No Time Limit
Time Attack mode, another game in Puzzle
